Articles.Content:
Sorry if I'm posting this in the wrong spot, but I'm a bit new to using the forum (not the game, by any means)

I am wondering, has FireSpitter been updated for .90 yet? If so, I can't find it anywhere. I only need the mod for the small landing gear it comes with, so on that note (if FS hasn't been updated) does anyone know of a mod that has very, VERY small landing gear?

Thank you for any help.
The place to ask would be the mod's own thread, here. I would advise posting there.
